channel.title: Stained on Ksbigbass
channel.description: Recent content in Stained on Ksbigbass

item.title: Buzzbait conditions
item.description:
Buzzbait conditions: The conditions were perfect for a buzzbait bite â€” post-frontal with a nice chop on the water, just enough to break up the profile of my bait. It was a textbook presentation.

I want the bass to eat topwater baits but I am not sure the conditions will allow, but if it does….Wow!

Buzzbait conditions:

When to:

Low skies, low light, and a slightly cooler day than you’ve been having, the topwater bite turns on
